newsitem.title: UK: European raw cotton sees nearby shipment strength.
newsitem.headline: European raw cotton sees nearby shipment strength.

text.p: The prevailing strength of nearby shipment offers for most upland cottons, served to stimulate a moderate enquiry, European raw cotton traders said.
Particularly for medium/better quality descriptions in several markets in Europe, notably Italy, Spain, Germany and Turkey, they added.
A somewhat better tone was also evident in a few eastern European countries. Demand for long staple varieties, in contrast, remained regionally dull.
